Text: Help Millions Pledge Today Cc for attending one of the Executive Breakfasts held at DePelchin Childrens Center this week Seeing is believing I hope you enjoyed se eing first hand how the dollars you give really do make a difference As was mentioned in the breakfasts it is very easy to make your contributi on this year by simply clicking on the United Way link or go directly to Internet Explorer or Netscape and type in unitedwayenroncom in the address field Either option should take you directly to Enrons United Way Campaign site Pledge card s will not be distributed this year so please make your pledge electronicall y it only takes minutes Please call me at if you have questions or have any difficulti es at all accessing the site Thanks again Your participation is important to the success of the campaig n

Reminder of HR BiWeekly Meeting Tomorrow Cc This is a friendly reminder of the HRBiWeekly Leadership Meeting tomorrow Tuesday October at am This meeting will be in C If you are unable to attend please let me know PS A light breakfast will be served Note to Jon what do we call you at Thank you Zulie
